paragraphs: Bizim Çatı Hotel Restaurant, located on the shores of Lake Mogan in Gölbaşı, one of the most beautiful spots in Ankara, is a place where you can enjoy delicious food and reasonable prices, surrounded by nature with friendly staff and quality service.

Seasonal events, including sausage grill parties around the shepherd's fire, anchovy BBQ parties, New Year's celebrations, etc., are some of the fun and unforgettable events associated with our establishment.

Bizim Çatı Hotel Restaurant provides rooms where you can stay safely and comfortably with your family, a meeting room for your meetings and business studies, a lakeside restaurant offering various flavors, a garden area adorned with weeping willows and other trees with a capacity of a thousand people for events like weddings, engagements, circumcision ceremonies, group dinners, company picnics, etc., and a poolside area that can accommodate four hundred people, ensuring your special days become unforgettable memories with our experience and quality service.
Bizim Çatı Hotel Restaurant is also equipped with open and closed play areas and a mini zoo to ensure that your children have a delightful time.
We invite you to Bizim Çatı Hotel Restaurant for a beautiful day that rivals the warmth and comfort of your home.

headers: Welcome to the Unique Flavors of Barbecue and Grill!
The Best Address for Barbecue and Grill
paragraphs: Who can resist the taste of meats and vegetables cooked over a live fire, accompanied by the delightful scent of smoke? Known around the world by various names—'BBQ' in the UK and USA, 'barbie' in Australia, 'braai' in South Africa, and 'mangal' in our culture—this unique cooking method has universal appeal. Located in Gölbaşı, Ankara, Bizim Çatı is famous for being one of the best places to experience an unforgettable grilling experience, whether you cook it yourself or order directly from us.

Grilling is not just a cooking method in Turkish culture, it's also a tradition where friendships are strengthened and pleasant conversations are had. At Bizim Çatı, we keep this tradition alive in the most delicious way possible. Our meats, prepared with special marinades, are expertly grilled over charcoal and served to you. Whether you try our classic kebabs or taste our grilled vegetables, discover the indispensable flavors of the grill.

Our restaurant, with chefs specialized in barbecue and grilling, offers you an unforgettable taste experience. Our dishes, cooked outdoors, appeal to both the eye and the palate. With the option to 'cook your own' or have our expert chefs prepare your meal over hot coals, a wide menu full of grilled delights awaits you.

If you want to embark on a unique culinary journey through the magical world of fire and smoke, you are invited to Bizim Çatı in Gölbaşı, Ankara. The right address for unforgettable moments and mouth-watering flavors!
li_content: We always use the freshest and highest quality ingredients.
Achieve perfect flavor with our experienced chefs who specialize in barbecue and grill.
We offer a warm environment where you can enjoy time with your family and friends.
An extensive barbecue and grill selection that caters to various tastes.
